summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4876 for the improvement of West Newton Street, from 26th Avenue West to 28th Avenue West; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55951, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
